messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: Rescue Remedy?

messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7-22-2003 8:42:25 AM Mountain Daylight Time,
kbcdlovejo@... writes:

> It *could* be the same. The one I have is "Bach Original Flower Essences
> Rescue Remedy Natural Stress Relief".
>
> ~Kelly
>

That's it!! The worlds most perfect product! It now comes in a handy-dandy
spray bottle ~ no glass dropper to break! Basically speaking, it's homeopathic
medicine for your chi :) Rescue Remedy is a specific blend for *shock* there
are also individual flower essences available for specific issues ~ Cherry
Plum is my personal favorite, it treats: the fear of loosing one's mind <bg> I've
used others, as well, for a multitude of things...
diana,
The wackiest widow westriver...

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-Discussion] Re: Rescue Remedy?
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/22/2003 10:31:56 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Everyone s asking *me*, the newbie to Rescue Remedy!  It s herbal, from the health food
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/22/2003 10:31:56 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
CHILDLEDucator@... writes:


> Kelly,
> Not to sound silly, but what is Rescue Remedy? Where to find it? I have an
> oral mixture for ADHD that is herbal. Is that similar?
> Peace,

Everyone's asking *me*, the newbie to Rescue Remedy! <g>

It's herbal, from the health food store.

It *could* be the same. The one I have is "Bach Original Flower Essences
Rescue Remedy Natural Stress Relief".

~Kelly
